mapper.insert: insert into ProjectCareer(projectCareerId, resumeId, projectName, developmentPeriod, duration, language, dbos, etc) values( #{projectCareerId}, #{resumeId}, #{projectName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{developmentPeriod, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{duration, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{language, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbos, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etc, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update ProjectCareer set projectName = #{projectName}, developmentPeriod = #{developmentPeriod}, duration = #{duration}, language = #{language}, dbos = #{dbos}, etc = #{etc} where projectCareerId = #{projectCareerId}
